Hymn.Arabic: مُبَارَكَ الرَّبُّ الْإِلَهُ ؛ لِأَنَّهُ سَمِعَ صَوْتَ دُعَائِي .
Hymn.English: 6 Blessed be the Lord, Because He has heard the voice of my supplications!

Hymn.Arabic: الرَّبُّ هُوَ عَوْنِي وَنَاصِرِي ، عَلَيْهِ أتكل. هللويا.
Hymn.English: 7 The Lord is my strength and my shield; My heart trusted in Him.
